2164.subject: SPED
2164.descrlong: Based on current research which introduces important contemporary issues, such as the relationship between identification, assessment, and program planning for students with mild-severe disab. Covers formal and informal assessment, instructional strategies, curriculum design, and modifications which are relevant, age-appropriate and structured to ensure student success and independence in general ed and other learner-centered environments.  Online, hybrid and face to face. (Offered fall and sp.)
